25#ifndef __BITPIT_BINARY_STREAM_HPP__
26#define __BITPIT_BINARY_STREAM_HPP__
27
28#include <vector>
29#include <string>
30#include <fstream>
31#include <cstring>
32#include <iostream>
33#include <stdexcept>
34
35namespace bitpit {
36
37// Stream operators
38class IBinaryStream;
39class OBinaryStream;
40
41template<typename T>
42IBinaryStream & operator>>(IBinaryStream &stream, T &value);
43
44template<typename T>
45IBinaryStream& operator>>(IBinaryStream &stream, std::vector<T> &vector);
46
47template<>
48IBinaryStream & operator>>(IBinaryStream &stream, std::string &value);
49
50template<typename T>
51OBinaryStream & operator<<(OBinaryStream &stream, const T &value);
52
53template<typename T>
54OBinaryStream& operator<<(OBinaryStream &stream, const std::vector<T> &vector);
55
56template<>
57OBinaryStream & operator<<(OBinaryStream &stream, const std::string &value);
58
59// Binary stream
60class BinaryStream {
61
62public:
63 virtual ~BinaryStream() = default;
64
65 bool eof() const;
66
67 std::streampos tellg() const;
68 bool seekg(std::size_t pos);
69 bool seekg(std::streamoff offset, std::ios_base::seekdir way);
70
71 char * data();
72 const char * data() const;
73
74 virtual void setSize(std::size_t size);
75 std::size_t getSize() const;
76
77 std::size_t getCapacity() const;
78
79 int getChunkSize();
80 int getChunkCount();
81
82protected:
83 std::vector<char> m_buffer;
84 std::size_t m_size;
85 std::size_t m_pos;
86
87 BinaryStream();
88 BinaryStream(std::size_t capacity);
89 BinaryStream(const char *buffer, std::size_t capacity);
90 BinaryStream(const std::vector<char> &buffer);
91
92 void open(const char *buffer, std::size_t capacity);
93 void open(std::size_t capacity);
94
95 void setCapacity(std::size_t capacity);
96
97private:
98 int m_chunkSize;
99
100};
101
102class IBinaryStream : public BinaryStream {
103
104template<typename T>
105friend IBinaryStream & (operator>>)(IBinaryStream &stream, T &value);
106
107public:
108 IBinaryStream(void);
109 IBinaryStream(std::size_t size);
110 IBinaryStream(const char *buffer, std::size_t size);
111 IBinaryStream(const std::vector<char> &buffer);
112
113 void open(const char *buffer, std::size_t size);
114 void open(std::size_t size);
115
116 void read(char *data, std::size_t size);
117
118};
119
120class OBinaryStream : public BinaryStream {
121
122template<typename T>
123friend OBinaryStream & (operator<<)(OBinaryStream &stream, const T &value);
124
125public:
126 OBinaryStream();
127 OBinaryStream(std::size_t size);
128
129 void open(std::size_t size);
130
131 void setSize(std::size_t size) override;
132 void squeeze();
133
134 void write(const char *data, std::size_t size);
135
136private:
137 bool m_expandable;
138
139};
140
141}
